topics.body:
I never thought I'd see the day where I think someone is more argumentative than me, but I agree with everyone else here.

I don't watch angryjoe so I don't give a shit; angryjoe is a c-list youtube celebrity; stop trying to cause shit in his name against neutrals.  The majority of people here are neutral on the topic of angryjoe vs nintendo; attacking neutrals is dumb because if you went after every neutral in the entire world on the topic of angryjoe vs nintendo you would be declaring a fight against 99.998% of the human population.

Tl:dr; Thanatos stop picking a fight against legitimately everyone in the world.
